name: Infferno
description:
Infferno is a post apocalyptic isometric top down shooter for 1-2 Coop Players Online or Local Offline

You guide a character who is trapped in a maze of sinister creatures. The game has a graphic with isometric perspective. From difficult gameplay, the game is full of enemies, as well as a lot of action.



The player controls a character that faces various deadly creatures and traps in a dungeon, where each level will discover more enemies and dangers.

We relied on procedural level generation to add more randomness to our game.



Cross Platform Multiplayer
We worked hard to release cross-platform functionality, where you can play with your PC, or you can play with phone device, even multiplayer online with your friends.



Controller Support
This game has Full Controller Support.
